name: Alnaar
movement: burrow 20 ft., fly 40 ft., walk 40 ft.
description: The Alnaar is characterized by its chaotic evil nature with a strong combination of speed and durability. It has fiery features that suggest its infernal origin, and its skin appears as if scorched.
memorable: Its fiery aura damages enemies nearby and its ability to destroy nonmagical weapons upon contact makes it a dangerous foe.
goals: To wreak havoc in combat and sustain itself by feeding on larger creatures.
relations: Typically encountered alongside other fiends or in infernal realms.
environment: Fiery and chaotic environments, such as hellscapes or battlefields.
strengths: High damage output with abilities that ignite and damage enemies, excellent mobility, and resilience to many forms of damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage, and its combat effectiveness is impaired when starving.
attacks: Performs multiattacks with fiery fangs that deal piercing and fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Flare creates a large fiery explosion that can deal significant damage and knock enemies prone.
senses: Has darkvision extending 120 feet and a passive perception of 15.
skills: Excels in acrobatics with a +10 bonus, allowing for agile maneuvers.
additional_information: Condition immunities include frightened and poisoned.
Deals additional fire damage to creatures that touch it.
Aggressively targets a single foe when starving.
Destroys nonmagical weapons with low Armor Class on contact.
test_queries: monstrous entity with a fiery aura
